EmailTemplate.description: Education Email about New FTU & left Navigation
EmailTemplate.name: New FTU & Left Navigation
EmailTemplate.subject: QuickBooks Update - You will love our new look!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Intuit QuickBooks
Call 1800 102 5599
You will love our new look! We have been working on changing the dashboard to make it easier for you. The navigation bar will become simpler!
See what’s changing
Sales & Expenses Manage all things related to sales and expenses within their respective tabs.
Banking See all your bank transactions instantly on the top.
Accounting Chart of Accounts and Reconcile clubbed under the new Accounting tab.
Know More
The terms and conditions of pricing for purchase and renewal of QuickBooks subscriptions may change without prior notice. Having trouble reading this email? View on web. To unsubscribe or change your email preferences, Click here. Intuit respects your privacy. To learn more, read our Privacy Statement. If you receive a suspicious email, please report it. Visit Security to find more. © Intuit India Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
